title:
An Infinite Product for e^gamma via Hypergeometric Formulas for Euler's
  Constant, gamma

title_detail.value:
An Infinite Product for e^gamma via Hypergeometric Formulas for Euler's
  Constant, gamma

summary:
We derive hypergeometric formulas for Euler's constant, gamma. A "by-product"
of Thomae's transformation is an infinite product for e^gamma involving the
binomial coefficients. Alternate, non-hypergeometric proofs use a double
integral for gamma, the beta integral, and an integral for the digamma
function. (I thank P. Sebah, S. Zlobin, and W. Zudilin for valuable suggestions
used in the paper.)
